triage.summary: Redundant conditional in next_id() - if/else produces same result
triage.root_cause: max(..., default=0) + 1 when todos is empty equals 1, making else branch redundant
triage.fix_approach: Simplify to single return: max((todo.id for todo in todos), default=0) + 1
verification_targets: Multiple todos with sequential IDs returns max + 1
Multiple todos with non-sequential IDs returns max + 1

implementation.test_added: tests/test_minimal_framework.py:164-185 (5 new tests for next_id edge cases)
